website_summaries.verdict: Demure and sweet, little girls will feel comfortable and mermaid-like, without tripping over a long tail.
pros: Designed in deep aqua blue fabric and can instantly transport an imaginative kid into mermaid-mode
Will hold up for those real-life princesses who like to romp around
Cute and playful, with layers of fabric not found in other costumes
Designed for play, as well as cruises and family excursions
cons: While all the glitter makes for fun and great pictures, it does leave a mess behind

customer_reviews.title: Discrepancies
customer_reviews.text: I see differences between the picture and what arrived. One- the straps do not poof out like that, they are just think and flat. Two- How the bottom the front is a leg's with higher than the back. Not the case. It might be an inch or so higher in the front. If it were up to me I'd return it and pick out a new one but DD likes it and I don't want to break her heart.
customer_reviews.author: iheartamazon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and bright Ariel dress
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful dress with wonderful bright colors. I bought for my just turned 4 yr granddaughter who is smaller than average. The dress fit was a little slimmer than the other Disney dresses she has but fits great now; may not fit until 6 however. The front of the dress length was slightly above the floor with the back longer and hitting the floor. She loves it and has been wearing it since her birthday 2 days ago.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer J Murray

customer_reviews.title: but like a normal cheap ish play dress
customer_reviews.text: The dress is cute, but like a normal cheap ish play dress. My step daughter was not a fan because it was itchy like most dresses. But it looks as expected. A little pricey but not bad. All in all a good play dress.
customer_reviews.author: MadRussian

customer_reviews.title: My Daughter Approves!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 y.o. loves this costume. It's cute and fits her perfectly and she loves dressing up like one of her favorite Disney princesses. The quality seems to be pretty good, too.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica T.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold up...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my six year old and she wore it trick or treating to three houses before it had a rip up the back (on the seam). She loves to play dress up, so I plan to try and sew it back up so she can continue wearing it. Overall I do not think it was made badly, just perhaps a bad design in how restrictive it is on the legs.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi Moore

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I thought since this was the more expensive Ariel costume, it would be better quality than some of the other ones that were available on Amazon. There were significant difference between the picture and what actually was delivered. I had to send the dress to a tailor for extra layers of tulle to be added as well as some light tailoring. This dress did not meet my expectations for the price paid. To add insult to injury.. the one on the Disney website is actually less expensive than this one is.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Torrence

customer_reviews.title: comfy - a good buy
customer_reviews.text: purchased a size too large for my 5 year old so that it'll last her more than a year. She loves the dress. No complaints about itchiness or comfort. It is long - perfect for my tall child.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Papery & cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Quality was horrible. I put it on my 5 year old and she LOVES Ariel but could only wear it for 3 minutes before ripping it off. Papery and rough.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Kids love these kind of toys
customer_reviews.text: The little girl that me and my wife bought it for loves it and is always playing with it and takes very good care of it
customer_reviews.author: zef

customer_reviews.title: We liked it
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with it. It's roughly the same outcome you would get when you buy any Halloween costume and compare it to its picture on the cover. In this case I'd say its closer to its picture representation than other costumes I've bought in the past, do yo me that's great.
customer_reviews.author: A big nobody

customer_reviews.title: Good Costume
customer_reviews.text: great costume! My daughter wanted to be Ariel for Halloween and this costume was great. It gave her the mermaid feel with having to trip over a tail all night long. It's held up well in the months after for play time too. It seemed better quality than you get at most big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: Photostar7980

customer_reviews.title: Lovely quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very lovely little costume for dress up play. Bought this for part of a Christmas present for my little princess crazy girl. Stress going to LOVE it! Great price, great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mermaid blanket
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but needs to be for children about 8
customer_reviews.author: kevin miles

customer_reviews.title: She loves it and it's a good quality for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Fits my almost three year old perfectly. She loves it and it's a good quality for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Short Life, but Looks Good
customer_reviews.text: This costume worked great for Halloween, but didn't stand up to repeated wear. The mermaid cut makes it a bit tight around the knee's, which did cause the skirt to tear after a few uses. I didn't expect this to fit for two years, so it still works for playing. Typical costume type material. Sizing was true to "regular" dresses.
customer_reviews.author: mng

customer_reviews.title: Costume
customer_reviews.text: Glitter! I was disappointed that it had glitter on it. Glitter makes such a mess. This is definitely a costume, cheap material and not the best quality for a dress up.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Theurer

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty dress
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the little girl who loves dress-up! Nice addition to our Disney princess collection!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking but by the time we was done truck r treating it had to big rips in it. I ended up throwing it away
customer_reviews.author: John bradley

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality - My daughter love its
customer_reviews.text: nothing bad to say at the moment, we'll see what happens on Halloween when we put it to use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute costume
customer_reviews.text: The costume was super cute however they sent me a different one in the picture. We kept because my daughter absolutely loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie_marie714

customer_reviews.title: Cute dress
customer_reviews.text: Got this dress for my three year old for Christmas. Good fit, good quality, good price. It is her favorite princess dress.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: 5yr old approved
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it. Glitter comes off a bit. Fit is as expected.
customer_reviews.author: John cortie

customer_reviews.title: Wont last
customer_reviews.text: Cheap material ripped the first day my daughter wore it
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Halloween Costume!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 yr old twins and they love love it! The small fit them perfectly. I was a little concerned it might run big but was true to sz. I am very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Taylorfam82

customer_reviews.title: I like cheese
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. My daughter is 5 and roughly in a 6T/6, fits great. Not bad quality at all! I'd recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Michael B & Erika

customer_reviews.title: Half the price of the Disney one
customer_reviews.text: Half the price of the Disney one....your daughter won't notice lol.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Werner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: as described ,but was never picked up from the post office
customer_reviews.author: Effie Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great Princess Dress for a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: This dress was in perfect condition and my 3 year-old daughter wore it to the Magic Kingdom (12+ hours!) last week. It held up and she loves it! Great Value.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee J

customer_reviews.title: ... loves to play dress up and this dress is adorable and fits well
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves to play dress up and this dress is adorable and fits well.
customer_reviews.author: mpogg

customer_reviews.title: bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: This was bought as a gift for a 4 year old girl, she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Denise O'Harra

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Arrived too small, with a stain, and had to be sent back. Thin and cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute costume, decent quality. My 6 year old really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Better than what we've found at Target or party city
customer_reviews.text: Quality is alright. Better than what we've found at Target or party city. Lots of glitter
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Not a good quality
customer_reviews.text: Worn once and the entire bottom of undergown came off. Not a good quality
customer_reviews.author: Bportman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute costume, and my 6 year old loved it!
customer_reviews.author: pen name

customer_reviews.title: ... was Arielle day and my little Arielle was very happy with her outfit
customer_reviews.text: It was Arielle day and my little Arielle was very happy with her outfit!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J Palmer-Caban

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Costume! Great quantity!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! My daughter loved her costume along with the other accessories I bought along with it. She wore it to Mickeys Not So Scary Halloween Party at Disneyworld. She looked amazing and this costume was perfect! I might add it is a little big as it kept falling off her shoulders. Other than that it’s was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Za

customer_reviews.title: ... cheap this was that it wasn't going to be great quality. It was the absolute best costume I ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought with how cheap this was that it wasn't going to be great quality. It was the absolute best costume I have ever bought. Great quality. Fit well. And didn't look cheap.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Made Poorly
customer_reviews.text: Costume was made so poorly! The skirt ripped off while my daughter was trick or treating.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great costume!
customer_reviews.text: The costume fit right and was just what my daughter wanted for dress up.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Jones

customer_reviews.title: Prompt shipping and product very nicely made, much better than the Ariel costumes in ...
customer_reviews.text: Prompt shipping and product very nicely made, much better than the Ariel costumes in the stores, feels very good quality and a great fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: my granddaughter love it and so did I
customer_reviews.text: very well made, true to size, looks amaizing. my granddaughter love it and so did I. Overall great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, exactly as pictured and a terrific price for so much bling! So cute!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Adorbs
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Easy to walk in and the kid loves it
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: but fine around the waist
customer_reviews.text: This dress had a weird fit for a toddler - too large around the neck, but fine around the waist.
customer_reviews.author: Charity A. Hermes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 2 1/2 yr old loves this to play dress up in.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: but overall good
customer_reviews.text: Material not as soft as expected, but overall good buy
customer_reviews.author: AbiCus

customer_reviews.title: My three year old daughter loves this and she never ...
customer_reviews.text: My three year old daughter loves this and she never wants to take it off. Exactly what I purchased it for, so I'd say five stars. :)
customer_reviews.author: Renee N

customer_reviews.title: My little one loved her costume
customer_reviews.text: My little one loved her costume. She is 3 and it was a little too long but i just used pins to pick it up in certain areas and it was all good. She used it 4 days in a row, we had so many halloween activities going on and it kept well and no tearing. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Itzaira Pagan

customer_reviews.title: it is beautiful but useless if it isnt comfy
customer_reviews.text: Lovely costume but my 3 year old wouldnt wear it because she said the top was too itchy. The upper part of the costume did have rough spots, it is beautiful but useless if it isnt comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Renna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Order arrived promptly and was just what my grand-daughter wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Studious investor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 6 fit her a little loose. Fixed with a few bobby pins.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in Ariel Costume
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected for a costume for a 3 yr old girl....too grown up.
customer_reviews.author: Mz Lady

product_meta.title: Ariel Classic Disney Princess The Little Mermaid Costume, Small/4-6X
product_meta.description: Size:Small/4-6XWith unforgettable characters and thrilling adventures, The Little Mermaid is one of the most celebrated animated films of all time. Venture under the sea where Ariel, a free-spirited mermaid princess, longs to be part of the human world. After bravely striking a bargain with Ursula, a sneaky sea witch, Ariel embarks on the adventure of a lifetime. With Flounder and Sebastian at her side, Ariel will need all of her courage and determination to make things right in both her worlds.
feature_bullets: Product Includes: Dress with character cameo

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars154 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
